tool_description: Calculates vehicle fleet size requirements based on schedules, route characteristics, and operational parameters including layover and deadhead times.

cycle_times.description: Complete round-trip time for each route in minutes

layover_time.description: Layover time at terminals in minutes (2-20)

deadhead_factor.description: Additional time factor for deadhead movements (1.0-1.3)

spare_ratio.description: Ratio of spare vehicles to active fleet (0.1-0.3)

error_messages: Schedule data mismatch: route_schedules and cycle_times arrays must have equal lengths.
Invalid layover time: layover_time must be between 2-20 minutes.
Invalid deadhead factor: deadhead_factor must be between 1.0-1.3.
Invalid spare ratio: spare_ratio must be between 0.1-0.3.
Schedule not found: One or more route_schedules identifiers not recognized.
usage: Provide route schedules and cycle times. Configure operational parameters for layover, deadhead, and spare vehicle ratios. Returns fleet size requirements.

active_fleet_size.description: Number of active vehicles needed for each route

total_fleet_required.description: Total fleet size including spare vehicles

utilization_rate.description: Fleet utilization percentage during peak service
